tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sonal Jain was very approachable and friendly and she enquired about my situation virtually. She then provided me right guidance during my 12-days of isolation for COVID-19 and ensured I submitted her with daily diary updates on my medication intake and symptoms for every few hours such as spO2 levels, heartbeat, body temperature and breathing conditions. She was a great guide and ensured I was aware of what to expect and what step was needed until I tested negative and was out of my self isolation. I highly recommend her.
She has loads of patience and makes the patient feel extremely comfortable. Her diagnosis is to the point and the patient feels safe in her hands. I would definitely recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words 🙏🏻

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sonal Jain first patiently listened to my Vertigo Problems. After that she explained in detail the root cause of the Problem. Would definitely visit her again without a second thought for any other Health issues
